data.title: My Fabulous Birthday @ Bella's
data.text: This place is so good. The ambience is wonderful. The staff is fabulous. The chef is Top Notch and I have been to some really nice places. This is a must try. Totally enjoyed my dinner. Everything from the Wine to the deserts was AWESOME. We will definitely be back soon.

data.title: Dinner
data.text: We were there for a special opening for med school ceremony.  The staff was so friendly and the food and wine amazing. Enjoyed the atmosphere!

data.title: Excellent Food and Service
data.text: Took my wife to Bella's.  We greatly enjoyed our meals and the appetizer.  The service was excellent.  We even ate dessert.  It is not crowded if you go early and they have live music later in the evening on Friday and Saturday.  There are two bars in the restaurant and table seating is available in multiple levels of the restaurant.  There is a private meeting room downstairs.  This is one of the more upscale restaurants in Dothan but the prices are comparable to other nice chain restaurants in town.

data.title: Best In Dothan
data.text: Although not from Dothan, I have been here 3 tines in the past year. Bella's is by far the best  restaurant in the area. The food, atmosphere and service are all great. It is billed as fine dining but it is not expensive for the quality of the food and service. Nina took great care of us. I will definitely return.

data.title: Great everything
data.text:
Great service (great waitstaff)
Great food (All 7 of our party commented on how good the food was)
Good wine selection We were familiar with many of the wines in the selection.
Overall we had a great experience!
Would and will recommend to others.

data.title: Great Italian Restaurant!!
data.text: I had a business dinner with an international guest and the food, service, and wine were great and the ambiance in a historic building in Downtown Dothan was a very nice experience!!

data.title: Amazing!!!
data.text: Thank you Nina for taking such fantastic care of us on our anniversary. Love the atmosphere, amazing service, mouthwatering food. Will be back very soon!!

data.title: Bella's a hidden Gem
data.text:
Great place to go especially if you want a intimate ambience with your love or friends! 
Try the Eggplant Josephine for your app and they have a wonderful Blacken Mahi Mahi with beur blanc sauce! Dessert Sea salt Cheese cake !

data.title: Mercy!!
data.text: Nice service, went for Wine Down Wednesday, had mahi mahi blackened, very nice.  Accompanied by Reisling, topped off with creme brulee...the inside if this old building is eye catching.

data.title: Excellent food nice ambiance
data.text: Had dinner at Bella's last night. Menu offers a varied selection of seafood, pasta, chicken and beef. The bruschetta appetizer was wonderful. We had pasta tuna and chicken. All of the dishes were well prepared and pleasing to the palate. I was surprised by the light crowd for a Saturday night. The live entertainment was nice not too loud. This is definitely a treasure to behold in Dothan.

data.title: Best Find for fine dining
data.text: I was visiting Dothan and wanted a place where the ambiance was as good as the food. I was blown away by this downtown location. This three level restaurant was exactly what I needed. The wine was amazing. The filet was exquisite, seasoned and cooked to perfection. The waitstaff was knowledgeable and friendly. If you want to experience the finer things with a personal touch, do not pass this by!

data.title: Ok, But Probably Won't Return
data.text: Service was ok, food was average, but for the ambiance of the location was expecting a little more. Gave a wine list but didn't mention any beer or mixed drinks availability. Could be really nice if the ingredients were of better quality and maybe some kind of specials. Went on a Saturday evening and was 1 of 5 couples

data.title: Business Dinner on a Monday Night
data.text: Out of town company planned dinner with 20 for corporation in town on a rainy Monday night.  The waitress was slow on getting order started and going.  Almost a three hour dinner.  Food was average.  I personally ordered the blacken shrimp and  sausage over pasta.  There were 5 shrimp that were steamed, not blacken and three pieces of sausage for $22.  Salad was small.  Mahi Mahi was dry and overcooked as well as the rice.  For a up scale restaurant, the service and menu should have been a step above. I was not impressed and would not recommend.

data.title: Will not return
data.text: Floors were dirty,Service was slow and incorrect. Kitchen staff had zero hair nets or hair restraints. No gloves observed. It is an open kitchen.Bread basket was old and bread was stale. Ice Tea was warm. Only beer and wine served. Alfredo sauce was not reduced correctly and had an off taste. Over priced and lacks quality. As a prior restaurant owner and member of the American Culinary association I don't leave bad ratings often , but I was sad to see this place advertised as a "Fine Dining Place". It is not. I saw zero original items on the Menu. The Menu had Soup, But the Chef had not prepared any. How long does it take to prepare a quality soup? Avoid this place

data.title: Excellent!!!
data.text: Had a group of friends to meet there on a guys night out,  just simply amazing! A little costly,  but we'll worth it.  Their wait staff are so professional and knowledgeable about their menu, and the food is outstanding. We grabbed a few appetizers for the table,  the bacon wrapped shrimp was a big hit,  the bar is not a lot to choose from the waiter told me they were going strictly to beer and wine, wich is a pretty cool idea, they have an awesome wine menu by the way.  Our group had an awesome time at Bella's! Thank you guys.

data.title: Great lunch spot
data.text: Heard they just reopened for lunch and had to give Bella's a try. I went with a Caesar salad and a bowl of chicken fettuccine Alfredo. Both hit the spot and we worth the cost. This place is sure to be a success at lunch and would give it a try if you have the time.

data.title: Birthday nite
data.text: Good, quiet place on a Monday evening. Took my wife there for her birthday. Appetizer was very good, meals were outstanding and wine was good. Waiter was attentive.

data.title: Best Restaurant in Dothan
data.text: There is almost no where in Dothan to dress up and have an elegant dinner. Bella's is the only true local, nice restaurant in Dothan. We have enjoyed every entree we have tried and the wine selection is very good. The staff is excellent and they make the meal even more enjoyable.

data.title: Intimate Dinner for Two
data.text: My wife and I ate here on a rare "date night". We enjoyed a great meal that was served by a waitress that was both attentive and non intrusive. We will dine here again.

data.title: Now serving Lunch
data.text: We had the ribeye sandwich, home cut fries, and french onion soup. The sandwich was great other than a little fat on the steak. The homemade sauce they put on it is delicious! Fries are perfect.....just small portion. French onion soup didn't have any cheese but it was still very good!
